00010 
00011 #ifndef COMPLETION_HANDLER_H
00012 #define COMPLETION_HANDLER_H
00013 
00014 #include <memory>
00015 
00016 NS_IZENELIB_AM_BEGIN
00017 
00018 class request;
00019 
00020 class completion_handler_impl
00021 {
00022 public:
00023     virtual void operator () (request *) = 0;
00024     virtual completion_handler_impl * clone() const = 0;
00025     virtual ~completion_handler_impl() { }
00026 };
00027 
00029 
00038 class completion_handler
00039 {
00040 public:
00041     completion_handler() : sp_impl_(0) { }
00042     completion_handler(const completion_handler & obj) : sp_impl_(obj.sp_impl_.get()->clone()) { }
00043     completion_handler & operator = (const completion_handler & obj)
00044     {
00045         completion_handler copy(obj);
00046         completion_handler_impl * p = sp_impl_.release();
00047         sp_impl_.reset(copy.sp_impl_.release());
00048         copy.sp_impl_.reset(p);
00049         return *this;
00050     }
00051     void operator () (request * req)
00052     {
00053         (*sp_impl_)(req);
00054     }
00055     template <typename handler_type>
00056     completion_handler(const handler_type & handler__);
00057 
00058 private:
00059     std::auto_ptr<completion_handler_impl> sp_impl_;
00060 };
00061 
00062 template <typename handler_type>
00063 class completion_handler1 : public completion_handler_impl
00064 {
00065 private:
00066     handler_type handler_;
00067 
00068 public:
00069     completion_handler1(const handler_type & handler__) : handler_(handler__) { }
00070     completion_handler1 * clone() const
00071     {
00072         return new completion_handler1(*this);
00073     }
00074     void operator () (request * req)
00075     {
00076         handler_(req);
00077     }
00078 };
00079 
00080 template <typename handler_type>
00081 completion_handler::completion_handler(const handler_type & handler__) :
00082         sp_impl_(new completion_handler1<handler_type>(handler__))
00083 { }
00084 
00085 NS_IZENELIB_AM_END
00086 
00087 #endif
